_source.short_desc: Fulcrum allows anyone to automate field inspection processes in minutes.
_source.long_desc: Fulcrum is a field inspection management platform that ensures safer, higher quality, and compliant outcomes for mobile teams. With Fulcrum, organizations can digitize data collection and inspection processes in minutes, manage inspection-related issues and tasks in one place, effortlessly demonstrate compliance with regulations, and get consistent actionable insights and reports from teams in the field.
_source.pricing_details:
Starter: Get a no-risk taste of the Fulcrum field inspection management experience for up to 5 team members for one low price. $15 USD/month.

Professional: Automating field inspections with end-to-end task and issue resolution management and advanced location-intelligent inspection applications. $33/user/month (billed annually) or $42/user/month (billed monthly).

Enterprise: Transforming organizations by automating field inspection management impact at scale. Contact Fulcrum for pricing information.
_source.target_audience: Fulcrum is a field inspection management platform that enables you to build and capture information from the field. Design your forms using the drag-and-drop designer and deploy instantly!

media.caption: Data can be displayed on a web map interface for quality checks and analysis

category_features.name: Appointment Management
category_features.definition: Schedule, change or cancel appointments

category_features.name: Barcode / Ticket Scanning
category_features.definition: The ability to scan barcodes to ensure accurate pricing and label tracking

category_features.name: Code Enforcement
category_features.definition: Ensure all properties are adhering to government and legal codes

category_features.name: Customer Database
category_features.definition: Searchable repository of information about clients

category_features.name: Dispatch Management
category_features.definition: Manage sending personnel and resources to a site as needed

category_features.name: Failed Inspection Tracking
category_features.definition: Track and store information regarding failed inspections

category_features.name: Image Capture
category_features.definition: Process images and automatically scan for data

category_features.name: Report Templates
category_features.definition: Sample of reports that could be customized as needed or used as is

category_features.name: Subcontractor Management
category_features.definition: Track information, qualifications, and contact details of subcontractors

category_features.name: Audit Trail
category_features.definition: Track changes and view date/time records

category_features.name: CRF Tracking
category_features.definition: Collect and track all case report forms (CRFs) within a centralized repository

category_features.name: Clinical Study Management
category_features.definition: Tools to manage single or multiple clinical studies within a centralized platform

category_features.name: Data Capture and Transfer
category_features.definition: Import, collect, and capture data from multiple sources

category_features.name: Data Verification
category_features.definition: Process of checking different types of data for accuracy to avoid errors or inconsistencies

category_features.name: Distributed Capture
category_features.definition: Uses decentralized resources such as network scanners, multi-function devices (MFD), and desktop scanners to collect data and documents

category_features.name: Document Classification
category_features.definition: Tag documents so that they may be searched via those tags

category_features.name: Document Imaging
category_features.definition: Convert paper files into digital images

category_features.name: Forms Management
category_features.definition: Organize, store and distribute forms and form templates in a centralized location

category_features.name: Remote Data Capture
category_features.definition: Capture data electronically

category_features.name: Access Controls/Permissions
category_features.definition: Define levels of authorization for access to specific files/folders

category_features.name: Archiving & Retention
category_features.definition: Process of moving and separately storing data that is not actively used or continuous storage of data for compliance purposes

category_features.name: Collaboration Tools
category_features.definition: Ability to work collectively on a project while communicating and sharing information within the system in real time

category_features.name: Drag & Drop
category_features.definition: Click and object and drag and drop through an interface

category_features.name: Forms Creation & Design
category_features.definition: Create and design new forms from scratch using templates and design tools, or scan and convert existing forms into the system

category_features.name: Full Text Search
category_features.definition: Look through entire documents, not just sections

category_features.name: Process/Workflow Automation
category_features.definition: Design workflow paths once and apply the logic to enable automatic creation of future processes and workflow

category_features.name: Version Control
category_features.definition: Track revisions and updates to collateral, and navigate between versions of the same documentation

category_features.name: Compliance Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage non-adherence to policies in a service, product, process, or supplier behavior

category_features.name: Data Analysis Tools
category_features.definition: Analyze survey results via statistical testing or crosstabs directly within the software

category_features.name: Email Marketing
category_features.definition: Create and send email blasts/campaigns

category_features.name: Mobile Survey
category_features.definition: Distribute a survey via mobile devices

category_features.name: Offline Response Collection
category_features.definition: Allow participants to fill out and submit the survey without internet connection

category_features.name: Question Branching
category_features.definition: Show participants specific questions based on their answer to a previous question (ie. different paths)

category_features.name: Question Library
category_features.definition: Prepopulate common question/answer options

category_features.name: Site Intercept Survey
category_features.definition: Survey popup over a webpage to specific users based on their behavior

category_features.name: Skip Logic
category_features.definition: Avoid showing participants irrelevant questions as determined by the answer to a previous question

category_features.name: Support Audio/Images/Video
category_features.definition: Allow media to be embedded in the question or answer options

category_features.name: URL Customization
category_features.definition: Change the URL of your survey to fit your branding or survey title

related_products.short_desc: UpKeep is rated the #1 mobile-first Inspection Software to streamline work orders, facility, and asset management.
related_products.features: UpKeep's Inspection Software is rated the #1 mobile-first maintenance and asset management solution for your team. From your desktop to your phone and even your tablet, UpKeep is easily accessible from anywhere at any time. Create work orders on-the-go, get notifications when tasks are updated, and receive alerts straight from your app when assets go down making your business run more efficiently than ever before.

related_products.short_desc: HomeGauge ONE is the ultimate business toolkit for Home Inspectors. Try it for $9.90/mo for 3 months!
related_products.features:
HomeGauge ONE is a one-stop-shop, providing everything you need to manage, market, and grow your home inspection business, under ONE roof. 

No more juggling providers or platforms to manage all your business needs. You'll get:

Web Writer (& iOS mobile app)
Desktop Writer
Scheduler
Dashboards (Buyer, Agent, & Inspector)
Payments & Agreements
Forms & Templates
CRL (create repair list)
Websites, Content, SEO
Homebuyer PLUS Homebuyer benefits
Training & Support

Try us for $9.90/mo for 3 months!

related_products.short_desc: Eliminate paper inspection forms and improve inspection quality, with Whip Around's intuitive and easy to use inspections software.
related_products.features:
Whip Around enables drivers to more effectively and efficiently complete their vehicle inspections so they can get on the road safely, in no time at all.

This inspection data is housed on our digital platform, giving business owners and fleet managers instant access to inspections results and their fleets' vitals. 

Eliminate the need for paper and spreadsheets with customized digital forms, and track fault management - ensuring vehicles stay compliant, and drivers stay safe.

related_products.short_desc: MaintainX is mobile-first inspection digitization software that increases efficiency and real-time insights from the field.
related_products.features:
MaintainX is mobile-first procedure digitization software that allows frontline teams to conduct inspections, safety procedures, checklists and more from the field.

Here's what we digitize and take away from the clipboard:

-Safety Procedures
-Environmental Checklists
-Tooling & Gauge Reporting
-Maintenance Procedures
-Auditing/Inspection Workflows
-Training Checklists

We help managers to become more efficient operators by delivering real-time business insights from the field.

related_products.short_desc: Jolt is a tablet-based software for managing tasks, temperatures, checklists, and forms to help you handle inspections with ease.
related_products.features: Jolt is a tablet-based software for managing tasks, temperatures, checklists, and forms to help you handle inspections with ease. Real-time analytics and text notifications make sure nothing falls through the cracks, and digital checklists and forms ensure perfect records come inspection time. Trusted by over 300,000 hourly workers across the globe, Jolt helps manage inspections in the food, retail, maintenance, and healthcare industries.

related_products.short_desc: The #1 home inspection software for home inspectors. Simplify & automate scheduling, billing, report delivery, bookkeeping and more.
related_products.features: Home inspectors: simplify scheduling, billing, report delivery, bookkeeping and more with the #1 home inspection software from ISN. Automate repetitive tasks, get paid faster, track the status of jobs, keep in touch with clients and agents and integrate with home inspection tools. Not just repurposed software for another industry, ISN home inspection software is built for and by home inspectors. Get set up quickly with free training and world-class support that goes beyond setting up software.

related_products.short_desc: The #1 platform for digital project delivery and controls that connects teams to build the world. Trusted by 5+ million users globally
related_products.features: Owners and delivery teams trust Oracle Aconex for visibility, control, reduced risk, and connected teams. Drive efficiency in design and construction coordination, project controls and cost management, document management, and field management. Get fast time to value with construction management software that is easy to use and deploys in days.

related_products.short_desc: iAuditor gets everyone on the same paperless page. Move away from the tick and flick of paper to real-time visibility.
related_products.features: Safety is now a core component of brand reputation across every industry. Everyone has the right to expect a safe experience so businesses must prioritise the safety of their people and customers, with clear lines of communication that make everyone an active participant. With iAuditor you can share inspection reports with your stakeholders and other teams just by clicking a button. This commitment of adopting a safety culture holds the key to getting the world safely back to business.

related_products.short_desc: GoCanvas enables any business to replace inefficient paper-based inspections with customizable mobile inspection apps . No IT required!
related_products.features: GoCanvas is a cloud-based software that enables businesses to replace expensive and inefficient paper forms with powerful apps on their smartphones and tablets. GoCanvas enables users to collect information using mobile devices, share that information and easily integrate with existing backend systems. GoCanvas also offers the first business-only application store of its kind, with 20,000+ pre-built, fully customizable apps that work on all mobile platforms and serve 30+ vertical markets.

related_products.short_desc: Revolutionize inspections with enterprise-grade field-focused apps. Collect rich, accurate data and integrate with systems of record.
related_products.features: Does your field team perform regular inspections? ProntoForms' field-focused no-code app solution streamlines operations. Our powerful platform improves your business with real-time access to rich and accurate inspection data. Seamless integration enables instant distribution, in your format of choice, to your back-office or cloud services. Build and deploy custom apps that are easy to manage and easier to navigate. Receive complete and accurate work records from the field on time, each time.

similar_products.short_desc: Revolutionize inspections with enterprise-grade field-focused apps. Collect rich, accurate data and integrate with systems of record.

similar_products.short_desc: FORM OpX improves operational compliance by digitizing audits and inspections on mobile to reduce risk and improve safety and quality.
similar_products.features: FORM OpX empowers teams to improve operational compliance by digitizing audits and inspections to reduce risk and improve safety and quality from the frontline. Mobile workflows make it easy to capture the right data, at the right place, at the right time - every time. Teams stay connected with instant communications on mobile, and real-time insights allow leaders to spot and fix issues quickly and measure trends over time so teams can take action on the opportunities that move business forward.

Whip Around enables drivers to more effectively and efficiently complete their vehicle inspections so they can get on the road safely, in no time at all.

This inspection data is housed on our digital platform, giving business owners and fleet managers instant access to inspections results and their fleets' vitals.

similar_products.short_desc: Visual-based inspection & materials management solutions that improve infrastructure project quality & efficiency while reducing risk.
similar_products.features:
Visual-based inspection and materials management solutions that improve horizontal construction project quality and efficiency while reducing risk.

We help teams deliver infrastructure projects on schedule, with reduced risk, and increased safety. Fieldbook gives project owners and field teams the means to quickly capture, share, and act on evidence of the work being done.

similar_products.short_desc: IntouchCheck is an inspection software that turns any smart device into a digital clipboard - making updates & data collection easy
similar_products.features:
IntouchCheck is an inspection software that turns any smart device into a digital clipboard and easily rolls out standardized procedures to any location. Conduct audits and collect data instantly from remote teams and drive high-value insights into your daily operations.

Your customers expect and deserve a consistent experience regardless of when or where they visit your business. While you can't be everywhere at once, IntouchCheck can.

similar_products.short_desc: SBN Inspect is used by safety and compliance leaders to streamline inspections and reporting.
similar_products.features: Designed for safety and compliance leaders! SBN Inspect is easy to implement yet powerful inspection software. SBN Inspect features fully customizable forms that allow you to capture data your way. Comprehensive tracking of identified corrective actions helps make sure your business runs smoothly. Advanced reporting in the form of customizable dashboards and push-button reports makes sure you have the data you need. Save Time. Do More. Keep it Simple.

similar_products.short_desc: Operandio is an operations & digital checklist platform that helps business owners and managers raise the standard of their workforce.
similar_products.features:
Operandio is an operations and digital checklist platform that helps business owners and managers achieve staff accountability, safety, compliance and consistent business processes across multiple locations.

Raise the standard of your workforce with Operandio:

- Recurring tasks, checklists and procedures accessible via mobile or shared tablet apps
- Business knowledge and training, searchable and accessible to your entire workforce
- Powerful workforce messaging and communication
- Reporting

similar_products.short_desc: Designed especially for smaller municipalities. Permit and inspections software for Windows.  Ideal for automating your manual system.
similar_products.features:
Designed especially for smaller municipal jurisdictions! Windows based permit and inspections management system. Complete tracking of application, approvals, permit issuance, all inspections and C/O's when needed. Includes code enforcement inspections. Optional modules include contractor licensing, business licenses, rental property and/or landlord, annual fire inspections, elevator inspections and more.
Includes numerous ways to customize the system so it functions the way you do business.

similar_products.short_desc: Cloud-based environmental safety and compliance software to assist companies in optimizing their workflow, reporting, and analytics.
similar_products.features:
Salute's cloud-based safety software enables environmental health & safety teams to manage all data and workflow within one unified system - Assessments, Incidents, HazMat, Inventory, Training and more.

Automate follow-up with built-in task management, improve visibility with out-of-the-box dashboards, and build a data-driven safety culture with analytics.

Whether conducting an onsite inspection, managing a chemical inventory, or downloading an SDS- Salute makes it easy to do from any device.

similar_products.short_desc: Your easy-to-make, easy-to-connect custom mobile inspection and workflow system that is reliable and secure.  Private Label it!
similar_products.features:
Do inspections YOUR way. Our flexible platform makes it easy for you to design simple or complex inspections with calculations. Finished reports will look identical to your current designs, using Word/Excel templates. 

Add photos, annotations, GPS, Signatures, Audio/Video, and more. Enforce business rules and field visibility. Get real-time analytics and scoring using our business logic engine. Automate (RPA) document assembly, distribution, filing and notification included.

similar_products.short_desc: Inspection Software Made Easy. Simple. Flexible. Scalable. Setup in Minutes. Try for 1 Month Free. ISO & FDA Traceability.
similar_products.features: Inspection Automation Software Made Easy. 100% Cloud-Based Platform. Unlimited Scalability. Easily Create a Global Inspection Tool for Multiple Sites. Easy Set-Up. Setup Inspection Forms and Train Employees. Includes End-To-End Traceability. Link Failed Inspection Records to Nonconforming Products or Corrective Actions. One Unified Platform. Automate Business Processes & Boost Quality. Save Time & Money. Increase Profitability. Minimize Recalls. Try for 1 Month Free.

similar_products.short_desc: SmartGov helps your organization simplify planning, permitting, licensing, inspections, code enforcement and more.
similar_products.features: Brightly Software's (formerly Dude Solutions) SmartGov is a configurable cloud-based licensing and permitting solution for local and state jurisdictions that promotes internal efficiency, reduced processing times, and increased confidence from citizen and applicants. Manage permits, business licenses, inspections, code enforcement, planning, and reporting with configurable plan review, permit routing and forms that enhance operational efficiency, reduce labor costs and engages your community on the web or mobile platforms.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Code Enforcement software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Code Enforcement tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Code Enforcement software assists government organizations in enforcing compliance with the municipal code requirements by maintaining records, scheduling inspections, issuing notices and tracking violations. Code Enforcement software also includes applications for searching various code requirements. For related software see Compliance software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Field Service Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Field Service Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Field Service Management software enables organizations to manage resources and communicate with field employees. Field Service Management systems enhance productivity by allowing constant contact between dispatch office and offsite personnel. They improve the customer experience by giving field personnel access to service histories, mapping services, scheduling tools and to the organization's knowledge base resources. Field Service Management software is related to Maintenance Management software and Service Dispatch software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Food Service Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Food Service Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Food Service Management software enables inventory control, purchasing, receiving and recipe management for both public and private food service operations. Organizations use these applications to manage their back office functions as well as their customer relationship and accounting needs. Food Service Management software helps to control costs, monitor inventory, and automate labor intensive tasks. Food Service Management software is related to Catering software, Food Service Distribution software and Restaurant Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Government software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Government tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Government software automates the financial and administrative operations of government organizations. Public sector officials use these applications to automate the operation and management of a wide array of public service functions and administrative processes. From financial management to operations, taxation, permitting and human resources, Government software applications add increased efficiency and accountability to government operations. Government software is related to Fund Accounting software, and EHS Management software.

similar_products.features:
Upflowy is a no-code SaaS product that gives you complete control of your signup flow. Design, tell your brand story, analyse each data point and then optimise for success.

You'll be able to measure instantly and at every point, with actionable insights and instant funnel analytics. When optimising, you're able to define smart experiments with A/B testing and personalisation capabilities that are easy to set up.

similar_products.short_desc: Sleeknote has everything online retailers need to make website forms that turn website visitors into subscribers and customers.
similar_products.features:
No two website visitors are alike. Many are visiting for the first time & need an incentive to become a lead (like a 10 percent discount). Others that are existing subscribers need nudging to make a purchase.

Sleeknote makes it easy to convert visitors into subscribers and customers, regardless of their funnel stage, using forms, popups, and more. 

With our drag-and-drop builder, you can easily create, customize, and manage as many campaigns as you like without needing a designer or developer.

similar_products.short_desc: Free online form builder with advanced capabilities that are sophisticated enough for developers, yet simple enough for novices.
similar_products.features: Cognito Forms is an advanced online form builder that boasts an intuitive, user-friendly interface and the most robust set of free features on the market. Designed from the ground up for today's Internet, the platform delivers extremely powerful features; including document merging, file uploads, repeating sections, save & resume, conditional logic, and integrated payments. Seamlessly embed your forms onto your website, and get notified via email whenever new entries are submitted.

similar_products.short_desc: Ideal for businesses of all sizes, it is a form building tool that helps users create survey forms while also reviewing submissions.
similar_products.features: Trusted by over 10 million users, Jotform's form builder is the easy way to create and publish online forms from any device. The company offers 10,000+ ready-made form templates, 100+ integrations to 3rd party apps, and advanced design features making it the leading online form builder for organizations all over the world. It's popularly used to create payment forms, lead generation forms, registration forms, contact forms, application forms, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: With monday.com Work OS you can create, edit, and manage forms and documents effectively with the help of a no-code form builder.
similar_products.features: With monday.com Work OS you can create, edit, and manage forms and documents effectively with the help of a no-code form builder. Use customizable form templates to collect, track, and analyze data while automatically syncing with your team and collaborating in real-time. Streamline workflows with the help of automations, view collected data in dynamic, visual dashboards, and standardize your organization's forms - all in one customizable platform.

similar_products.short_desc: Mobile app for completing inspections, audits, safety reports, orders, and many other tasks. Easy to use, enterprise grade.
similar_products.features:
Forms On Fire is your mobile app for accurate inspections, audits, safety reports, orders, and many other tasks.

Save time with pre-filled fields using data from your systems. Save time by eliminating travel back to the office. Save 100% of the time it takes to re-enter, re-assemble, file, and distribute forms to those who need them.

With enterprise-grade security, connections to thousands of systems, and ridiculously helpful customer service, you will delight your management team.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Data Entry software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Data Entry tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Data Entry software eliminates tedious and labor-intensive manual data entry by providing tools for automatic data extraction, verification, and transfer into a system database. Data Entry software is an essential part of Forms Automation software and Document Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Electronic Data Capture software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Electronic Data Capture tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Electronic Data Capture software collects information from documents and the internet and feeds it into appropriate business applications for further analysis. This software significantly reduces costs and saves time for professionals conducting research. Electronic Data Capture software is often used in Clinical Trial Management.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Forms Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Forms Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Forms Automation software gives companies the ability to streamline document workflows. These solutions optimize document creation, printing, faxing, merging, security, and inbound/outbound document traffic. Companies can create and manage nearly any kind of document, from invoices to incident reports, and can easily track collected information. Forms Automation software is relevant to most industries and is related to Business Process Management software, Content Management software, Contract Management software, and Document Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Survey software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Survey tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Survey software enables the efficient design and management of electronic surveys, polls, and questionnaires for market research, measuring customer satisfaction, and collecting employee feedback, along with many other applications. Survey software automates designing, scheduling, publishing, and conducting surveys while featuring a variety of user feedback formats including: radio buttons, check boxes, drop-down menus, and free-form text fields. Survey solutions also accommodate a variety of methodological approaches and provide data reporting tools. Survey software is related to Business Intelligence software and Reporting software.
